name: BeamSnap
overview: BeamSnap is a website that serves as an online marketplace. With a “Twitter-like” design, BeamSnap allows users to follow their favorite sellers and get updates on the latest deals. With our beaming feature, users can share their favorite deals with their friends through multiple social media networks and receive commission when a sale is made through their individual link. This provides sellers with an additional avenue for product marketing and users with a new potential stream of revenue.Sellers can list there items free of charge (no listing fee). What’s more, a seller can import their eBay ratings and items directly into BeamSnap.
